trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The steps in this article create an HDInsight cluster by using basic configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The steps in this article create an HDInsight cluster by using basic configuration settings.

trans-unit.source: For information about other cluster configuration settings (such as using Azure virtual network or a metastore for Hive and Oozie), see [Provision Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](../articles/hdinsight/hdinsight-provision-clusters.md).
